subject: Re: [junit] German book on Junit and test first ready for review
msgSnippet: ... While I have many books that mention JUnit, I have yet to read one that is about JUnit. Any recommendations. Alas, being a parochial American, English is
messageBody:
--- Vladimir Bossicard <vladimir@...> wrote:
> In the world of languages, there is English and there is also French,
> German, Hindi... Several books already exist in English so one in
> German cannot arm.

While I have many books that mention JUnit, I have yet to read one that
is about JUnit. Any recommendations. Alas, being a parochial American,
English is the only language in which I can read technical books.

Regards,

Rob
